price: ߞߊ߬ ߟߏ߯ߟߎߣߊ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߌ ߦߋ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߗߍ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ ߝߐ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisata anna ghaḍaba al-lahi ʿalayhā in kāna mina al-ṣādiqīna
